name: Notes associated with agencies included in the Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development: Volumes 29–72
description: Notes associated with agencies included in the Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development: Volumes 29–72

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: These notes include explanatory information on federal agencies' reports for volume 29 (FYs 1979–81) through volume 72 (FYs 2022–23) of the Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development (Federal Funds for R&D). For volume 72, actual data were collected for FY 2022, and estimates were collected for FY 2023.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development.
